hero.heading: Core Capabilities that power your Card Product
hero.descrip: What powers your card product should be invisible but never basic. Our core capabilities give you the compliance, security, and scale of a global platform, so you can focus on building your business, not your backend.

slides.subtitle: Meet regulatory requirements including PCI-DSS, local hosting, and secure data archiving.
slides.title: Security & Compliance

slides.subtitle: We manage third-party orchestration for end-to-end KYC flows and sanctions screening.
slides.title: Identity Verification In-a-Box

slides.subtitle: Artwork design, profile setup, testing, printing, personalization, and delivery handled end to end.
slides.title: Card Fulfillment & Delivery

slides.subtitle: Access the latest online transaction standards and enable push provisioning for iOS and Android.
slides.title: 3DS and Tokenization

slides.subtitle: Continuous float monitoring to ensure smooth and uninterrupted program operations.
slides.title: Collateral Management

slides.subtitle: Full chargeback and dispute management with regular follow-ups and updates.
slides.title: Chargebacks & Disputes

slides.subtitle: We handle all partner relationships seamlessly, from contracting to operations.
slides.title: Partner Management

slides.subtitle: Daily settlements and reconciliation with full reporting and transparency.
slides.title: Settlement & Reconciliation

slides.subtitle: Multilingual 24/7 live agent support for cardholders along with L2/L3 technical assistance.
slides.title: Cardholder & Technical Support

footer.heading: Power your card program with enterprise-grade infrastructure
footer.subheading: Our platform does the heavy lifting behind the scenes, so you can focus on growth.
